message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $85 for it.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer you a price of $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'm firm on my previous offer of $85.  If you're not willing to come down to that price, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand you're firm on your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I can offer you a compromise at $95. It's a fair price, considering the value of the product, and I think you'll be happy with it.
